entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , High River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6°C

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
